lead: Analyze the fictitious SAC emails and identify the errors by clicking directly on the incorrect phrases.

complete.title: Congratulations!
complete.text: You found all the errors in this email!

emails.subject: Re: Exchange Request #12345
emails.body: Dear Jo√£o, Thank you for contacting us. Regarding your exchange request for the product purchased at our physical store, we inform you that you have a right guaranteed by law to exchange within 7 business days. Please send the product to our technical support to proceed. Best regards, SAC Team

1.text: you have a right guaranteed by law to exchange
1.explanation: The exchange of a product WITHOUT DEFECT at a physical store is a COMMERCIAL POLICY (courtesy of the company), not a right guaranteed by law. The CDC only requires exchange in case of defect.

2.explanation: When applicable (online purchases), the Right of Withdrawal period is 7 CALENDAR days, not business days.

3.text: send the product to our technical support
3.explanation: A product WITHOUT DEFECT should not be sent to technical support. Technical support is for repairs of products WITH DEFECTS.

emails.subject: Re: Purchase Cancellation #67890
emails.body: Dear Maria, We received your cancellation request for the purchase made at our physical store last week. We inform you that you can exercise the right of withdrawal normally. Upon returning the product, we will refund 80% of the amount paid. We remind you that after the return, there will be no further possibility of complaint about the product. Best regards, SAC Team

1.text: you can exercise the right of withdrawal
1.explanation: The Right of Withdrawal (7 days) only applies to ONLINE purchases or those made outside the commercial establishment. It does NOT apply to purchases at physical stores.

2.text: we will refund 80% of the amount paid
2.explanation: When withdrawal is applicable, the refund must be FULL (100%), including shipping. Never partial.

3.text: after the return, there will be no further possibility of complaint about the product
3.explanation: The customer always retains the right to complain about HIDDEN DEFECTS (defects that appear later), even after previous returns or exchanges.

emails.subject: Re: Appliance Defect #11223
emails.body: Dear Carlos, We apologize for the inconvenience with your appliance. According to the Consumer Protection Code, you have up to 15 days to resolve the problem through technical support. If the problem is not solved within this period, we will only make a proportional discount on the value. Please go to the brand's authorized technical support for evaluation. Best regards, SAC Team

1.text: you have up to 15 days to resolve the problem through technical support
1.explanation: The correct period is 30 DAYS for the supplier to solve the defect through technical support, not 15 days.

2.text: we will only make a proportional discount on the value
2.explanation: After 30 days without solution, the customer has THREE options: product exchange, proportional discount OR full refund. Not just one option.

emails.subject: Re: Food Exchange #44556
emails.body: Dear Ana, Regarding your request to exchange the food product, we inform you that you can return the product to any store in our network. To expedite the process, it is not necessary to bring the receipt. Just bring the product. After analysis, we will exchange it for any product of your choice of the same value. Best regards, SAC Team

1.text: you can return the product to any store in our network
1.explanation: Food products must be taken to THE STORE WHERE THE PURCHASE WAS MADE, along with the receipt, for management evaluation.

2.text: it is not necessary to bring the receipt
2.explanation: The RECEIPT IS MANDATORY to validate the purchase and proceed with any complaint or product exchange.

3.text: we will exchange it for any product of your choice of the same value
3.explanation: Food exchange only occurs when the product is UNFIT FOR CONSUMPTION, not by customer preference. The reason, brand, and batch must be evaluated.
